episodes.content: Asakusa: a neighborhood that retains the feel of old Tokyo. At its old school theaters, called "yose," you can catch traditional comedic performances day in and day out. Yose theaters are facing tough times during the pandemic, but today we'll see how they're working hard to keep people smiling.
episodes.description: Old school theaters called "yose," are facing tough times during the pandemic. Today we'll see how they're working hard to keep people smiling through their traditional comedic performances.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Classic Tokyo Comedy Bringing Laughs
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Asakusa is one of Tokyo's most popular tourist destinations. But due to the coronavirus pandemic, visits to Asakusa are down, and the neighborhood is feeling the pinch. At the same time, it's using the situation as a chance to get inventive. This time, we take a virtual tour of Asakusa from our studio to see how things are going.
episodes.description: Due to the coronavirus pandemic, visits to Asakusa are down. Now it's using the situation as a chance to get inventive. We take a virtual tour of Asakusa from our studio to see how things are going.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: A Virtual Tour of Asakusa
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Masks: an essential tool in the fight against the coronavirus. Now Tokyoites are putting their own spin on masks, expressing their individuality with unique patterns and designs. Let's learn how masks are serving as both pandemic protectors and fashion items!
episodes.description: Tokyoites are putting their own spin on masks, expressing their individuality with unique patterns and designs. Let's learn how masks are serving as both pandemic protectors and fashion items!
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Masks on the Move
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: In Japan, the coronavirus pandemic has brought new attention to a Japanese creature or Yokai, called Amabie, who's said to protect against plagues. Thanks to social media, drawing images of Amabie has become a new trend. Let's find out more about this mysterious creature.
episodes.description: In Japan, the pandemic has brought new attention to a monster called Amabie. It's said to protect against plagues. Thanks to social media, drawing images of Amabie has become a new trend.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Amabie vs. the Pandemic
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The coronavirus pandemic has changed how we eat. With fewer visits to restaurants and more meals at home, people in Tokyo have started to think about food in a whole new way. Today we discover some new ways that food is nourishing both our bodies and minds.
episodes.description: The coronavirus pandemic has changed how we eat. With fewer visits to restaurants and more meals at home, people in Tokyo have started to think about food and nourishment in a whole new way.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: The Power of Nourishment
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The pandemic has revived interest in an old pastime: fishing! Many Tokyoites are discovering the fun of this relaxing, refreshing activity and enjoying the way it helps them get in touch with nature. Let's cast a line and learn more.
episodes.description: The pandemic has revived interest in an old pastime: fishing! Tokyoites are discovering the fun of this relaxing, refreshing activity and enjoying the way it helps them get in touch with nature.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Fishing for Relaxation
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The hotel business has taken a huge hit during the pandemic. That includes reasonably priced hotels popular with tourists from abroad, which are virtually on hiatus. Today, we find out how Tokyo hotels are fighting for survival by embracing new ideas.
episodes.description: The hotel business has taken a huge hit during the coronavirus pandemic. Today, we find out how hotels in Tokyo are fighting for survival by embracing new ideas.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Hotels Fight for Survival
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: During the pandemic, parks around Tokyo have been putting their impressive power on display. They're gaining fresh attention for their ability to connect people with nature -- and with each other. Let's take a refreshing stroll through Tokyo's great parks.
episodes.description: Parks around Tokyo are gaining fresh attention during the pandemic for their ability to connect people with nature. Let's take a refreshing stroll through Tokyo's parks.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Parks Offer Pandemic Peace
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Here on TOKYO EYE 2020, we've featured many people and organizations trying to make the most of the coronavirus pandemic and give back to society. Today, we'll revisit some of our stories from the past few months and see how the people behind them are doing.
episodes.description: We've featured many people trying to make the most of the coronavirus pandemic. We will revisit some of our stories from the past few months and see how the people behind them are doing.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Tokyo Fights On
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: In Tokyo, social businesses are giving a whole new shape to home life. They're creating affordable housing for those facing hardship, and devising "stockpiles" of unique new structures for disaster aid. Let's see how these efforts are progressing even in the midst of a pandemic.
episodes.description: Must-see Tokyo! Be like a local as you journey through this amazing city. Great food, unique shopping, plus the best and latest things to see and do.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: The New Shape of Home
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The pandemic has caused us all to rethink the way we live. Now people are taking a fresh look at the traditional Japanese philosophy of reducing waste embodied by the phrase "mottainai." Let's learn more about it, and see how it might lead to a better future.
episodes.description: People are taking a fresh look at the traditional Japanese philosophy of reducing waste embodied by the phrase "mottainai." Let's learn and see how it might lead to a better future.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Mottainai!
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: From earthquakes to typhoons, Japan faces many natural disasters. Now the pandemic has put a new spin on Japan's disaster management strategies. Let's see how groups are using streaming, social media and even games to increase preparedness in our new age.
episodes.description: The pandemic has put a new spin on Japan's disaster management strategies. Let's see how groups are using streaming, social media and even games to increase preparedness in our new age.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: The New Face of Disaster Preparedness
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: It's not just humanity fighting the pandemic: robots are joining in too! They're helping out by disinfecting buildings, acting as waitstaff at restaurants, and much more. There's even a cute robot helping people get rid of pandemic stress. Let's dive into Tokyo's robot revolution.
episodes.description: Robots are joining in the fight against the pandemic. It's disinfecting buildings, acting as waitstaffs and even helping people get rid of pandemic stress. Let's dive into Tokyo's robot revolution.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Robots on the March
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Taking a virtual trip is a great way to feel like you're traveling while staying safe at home. Today we'll showcase many ways to get the Tokyo experience, from lesser-known spots to the Tokyo of the distant past. See the city in a new light, all from the comfort of home!
episodes.description: Taking a virtual trip is a great way to feel like you're traveling while staying safe at home. Today, we'll showcase many ways to get the Tokyo experience through popular virtual tours.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Virtual Tokyo Tours
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Tokyo is one of the culinary capitals of the world. However, the pandemic has made it hard for Tokyoites to visit their favorite restaurants. This time, we'll look at how staying home is changing the face of Tokyo's culinary culture.
episodes.description: The pandemic has made it hard for Tokyoites to visit their favorite restaurants. This time, we'll look at how staying home is changing the face of Tokyo's culinary culture.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Stay Home Culinary Culture
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The pandemic caused a sudden stop to concerts, festivals and music events of all kinds. Many musicians are now facing an uncertain future. But the beat goes on. In these tough times, music is taking on new forms and helping give courage to those affected by the pandemic.
episodes.description: Many musicians are now facing an uncertain future. But the beat goes on. In these tough times, music is taking on new forms and helping give courage to those affected by the pandemic.
episodes.subtitle: Tokyo and the Coronavirus: Can't Stop the Music
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: Cherry blossoms - sakura - are one of the highlights of spring in Tokyo. But this year, normal cherry blossom viewing parties were off limits. That brought attention to new styles of sakura viewing, and to the people helping preserve the blossoms behind the scenes.
episodes.description: Normal cherry blossom viewing parties were off limits. That brought attention to new styles of sakura viewing, and to the people helping preserve the blossoms behind the scenes.
episodes.subtitle: Sakura Sakura: Tokyo Cherry Blossoms 2021
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020

episodes.content: The pandemic has created problems big and small. Those problems have inspired developers and inventors to create unique products to help give people a hand. This time, we explore the limitless possibilities of the imagination and its role in overcoming tough times.
episodes.description: The pandemic has created problems big and small, inspiring developers to create new products. We will explore the possibilities of the imagination and its role in overcoming tough times.
episodes.subtitle: Pure Imagination in Pandemic Times
episodes.title: TOKYO EYE 2020
